CodUser.title: CodUser
CodUser.description: Represents a user account within the CodBank banking application.

userId.description: Unique identifier for the user, matching their Firebase Auth UID.

username.description: Unique username chosen by the user.

email.description: Unique email address of the user.

password.description: Hashed password string (stored for administrative reference, though Auth is handled by Firebase Auth).

phone.description: Contact phone number of the user.

UserToken.title: UserToken
UserToken.description: Represents a secure authentication token for a specific user session or refresh flow.

tokenId.description: Unique identifier for the token document.

userId.description: Reference to the owner's CodUser userId.

definition.description: Main collection for user profiles. The document ID matches the user's Firebase UID for authorization independence.
Subcollection for user-specific tokens. Nested under the user for path-based security and isolation.

firestore.reasoning: The structure uses subcollections for tokens to ensure that security rules can easily restrict access to the owning user without needing cross-document lookups. This follows the Firestore best practice of path-based authorization.
